subject: OTC Margin Call Notice from Client ABS to CGGM Ltd
content:
Dear Sir/Madam,

 

Enclosed you will find our Notification of Collateral Demand. Please confirm your agreement of Collateral Movement and advise Settlement Date.

 

We would kindly ask you to provide your portfolio incl. MtM figures in case of disagreement.

 

--------------------------------------------

XXXXXX XXXXXXXX

Collateral Management Team

Client ABS

 

mailto: client@ <mailto:mailto:%20client@> abc.com

Tel.: +11 (0)1 11 11  Ext. 11111 / 11111 

 

 

Please consider the environment before printing this e-mail.

 

This e-mail is confidential and may also contain privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient you are not authorized to read, save, process or disclose this message. If you have received this message by mistake, please inform the sender immediately and delete this e-mail, its attachments and any copies. Thank you!
